1.Title: Flame-Devouring Choir
1.Description: Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When the equipper triggers an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> that deals <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>, their attacks ignore <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> of the target's DEF for 8s. Can stack once every 3s, up to 2 stacks. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
